dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5208 IH: To make technical corrections to the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Forbes introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To make technical corrections to the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 313(a) of the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 (16 U.S.C. 461 note) is amended by striking May 1978. and inserting May 1978, and in addition such lands located as the Secretary deems appropriate, not to exceed four acres..
